{{Description|A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.}}
'''Exile's Goblet''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[The Exile]].

==Description==
This silver goblet is a family heirloom of an exiled aristocrat. The exterior was once inlaid with a gem engraved with his family crest.<br>But after the exile had brought shame to his family, he carved out the symbol of which he was once proud.<br>As a result, this cup is broken and can no longer hold liquid.<br>But the exile still carries it with him until the end of his journey.
